collectible.title: Business Card
collectible.subtitle: Eh? Where'd this come from?
collectible.text: You never saw it happen, but apparently Joey slipped her business card in your pocket during the match.

collectible.title: Joey's Hat
collectible.subtitle: That's a very nice hat trick.
collectible.text: As a momento for winning, Joey thought it'd be nice to give you her -- hey, wait a minute, where'd it go? It was here a second ago...
collectible.unlock: Throw a nice hat party. (Play Joey with other hatted opponents.)

collectible.title: Naked Hug
collectible.subtitle: I think you just scored.
collectible.text: Joey felt bad that Aella was the only one who got a naked hug, so she gave you one too.
collectible.unlock: Get Aella and Joey to hug.
